commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_COL_ADD:H: Add the selected files to the collection represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_COL_GOTO:H: Go to the collection represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_COL_REMOVE:H: Remove the selected files from the collection represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_FOLDER_COPY:H: Copy the selected files to the folder represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_FOLDER_GOTO:H: Go to the folder represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_FOLDER_MOVE:H: Move the selected files to the folder represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_GROUP_ASSIGN:H: Assign the selected files to the categories represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_GROUP_GOTO:H: Go to the category represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_GROUP_UNASSIGN:H: Un-Assign the selected files from the categories represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_IMPEXP_ADD:H: Add a new favourite for an Import & Export preset
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_PROPERTIES:H: Edit the properties of the selected favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_RENAMER_ADD:H: Add a new favourite for a Renamer preset
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_SCRIPTS_RUN:H: Run the script represented by this favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_SET_CHOOSE:H: Choose which favourite sets to show
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_SET_EMPTY:H: Remove all entries from the active favourite set
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_SHORTCUT_EDIT:H: Edit the keyboard shortcut of the selected favourite
commands.ID_CMD_FAVORITE_TEMPL_ADD:H: Add a new favourite for a metadata template
commands.ID_CMD_FILE_READONLY_OFF:H: Mark the files in the current selection as writeable on disk
commands.ID_CMD_SEARCH_COLOR:H: Find images based on colours and colour distribution
commands.ID_CMD_SEARCH_CST:H: Find images by colour, shape and texture
commands.ID_MDCONTAINER_PANEL_KW_CONFIGURE_SHOWGR: Display keywords using the colour of the corresponding @Keyword category
commands.ID_MDCONTAINER_PANEL_KW_FAVADD:H: Add the selected entry to your favourites
commands.ID_MDCONTAINER_PANEL_KW_FAVDEL:H: Remove the selected entry from your favourites
commands.ID_VIEW_SHOW_FAVORITES:H: Show or hide the Favourites panel
commands.ID_VIEW_VIEWER_WORKSPACE:H: Maximise the viewer to occupy the entire application window

properties.anno.shape.framecolor:D: Colour for the frame or outline
properties.anno.textbox.framecolor:D: Colour for the frame or outline

properties.app.ui.resolution:D: This setting specifies the resolution in dots per inch (DPI) IMatch should use when displaying image dimensions in inches or centimetre.
properties.app.ui.thumbbackcolor:D: The background colour used for thumbnails in various controls and windows
properties.app.ui.thumbnailapplyicc:D: Enable this enable colour management for thumbnails. Depending on the performance of your computer this can slow down display and scroll speed in file windows.
properties.app.ui.thumbnailvibrance:D: This setting controls how much IMatch improves colours and contrast in thumbnails for display purposes. Set to 0 to disable.
properties.app.ui.tooltip.background:D: The background colour used for tooltips
properties.app.ui.tooltip.textcolor:D: The text colour used for tooltips
properties.app.ui.usegrayscaleicons:D: This setting controls if certain user interface elements are displayed in grey scale instead of colour.
properties.charts.colors:D: Select one of the available colour schemes.
properties.dbview.fm.backcolor.check.recursive:D: The background colour used for the 'recursive' check box.

properties.dbview.fm.textcolor:D: The text colour used for the control.

properties.dbview.fm.thumbnailframecolor:D: The frame colour used to fill thumbnails, and for folders without thumbnails
properties.dbview.fm.thumbnailgrayscale:D: Activate this option to display thumbnails in greyscale.
properties.favorites.backcolor:D: The background colour for this favourite

properties.favorites.name:D: The name to display for this favourite
properties.favorites.textcolor:D: The text colour for this favourite
properties.favorites.ui.maxwidth:D: The maximum width for a panel. The panel width adjusts to the actual name of the favourite. If the name does not fit into the maximum width, it will be shortened.
properties.favorites.ui.panelcolor:D: The background colour for the favourite panels.
properties.favorites.ui.paneltextcolor:D: The text colour for the favourite panels.
properties.favorites.ui.showicons:D: This option controls whether the favourite panels show icons or not.

strings.PTR_APP_IDPLATE_DEFTEXT: You can customise what you see here via the\napplication preferences. Right-click here for more options.
strings.PTR_FAVS_DROPPROMPT: Drop folders, categories or collections here to add new favourites.
strings.PTR_FAVS_TTIP_FOLDERFAV: This system Favourite set contains the folders recently used for copy or move operations.\r\nYou can use this set to easily repeat copy and move operations.
strings.PTR_FAVS_TTIP_GROUPFAV: This system Favourite set contains the categories recently used for assignments.\r\nYou can use these favourites to assign other files to the same categories or to remove them.
strings.PTR_IMPEXP_IMAGEEXPORT_DESC: This module exports images into various file formats and allows you to resize and change colour profile. It also allows you to add borders, text and image overlays.
strings.PTR_INFOPOPUP_FAV_COL: Clicking on a collection favourite adds the currently selected set of files in the active file window to the collection. To <Bold>remove</Bold> the images from the collection, use <Shift>+Click.
strings.PTR_INFOPOPUP_FAV_FOLDER: Clicking on a folder favourite copies or moves (when the <Shift> key is pressed) all selected files in the active file window to the folder associated with the favourite.
strings.PTR_INFOPOPUP_FAV_GROUP: Clicking on a category favourite assigns the currently selected set of files in the active file window to all categories in that favourite. To <Bold>un-assign</Bold>, use <Shift>+Click.
strings.PTR_MAINFRAME_STATUSBAR_DBOPEN_QUEUES: Initialising processing queues for background processing...

messages.PTR_MSG_ERR_SAVEFILE.caption: Failed to save file
messages.PTR_MSG_ERR_SAVEFILE.content: There was an error saving the file.\r\nPlease make sure that there is sufficient disk space available, the media is writeable and you have sufficient rights to save data on the media.
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_APP_ERROR.caption: Cannot find or start {0}
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_APP_ERROR.content: Please check the Windows shortcut to which this favourite refers and make sure that it points to a valid application.\r\n\r\n{1}
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_DELETEFAVSET.caption: Delete Favourite Set
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_DELETEFAVSET.content: Are you sure you want to delete the active favourite set?
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_DELETEFAVSET_SYS.caption: System Favourite Set
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_DELETEFAVSET_SYS.content: This is a system-controlled favourite set. You cannot delete it, just hide it.
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_GROUPDROP.btn.1001: Create Splasher\nCombines all dropped categories into a Splasher favourite.
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_GROUPDROP.btn.1002: Create individual favourites\nCreates one favourite for each dropped category.
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_GROUPDROP.caption: Category Drop
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_GROUPDROP.content: You have dropped more than one category. What do you want to do?
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_HOTKEY_EDIT_DUPLICATE_KEY.c:
This keyboard shortcut is already associated with the favourite '{0}'.
If this shortcut is in the same favourite set or you load the sets containing these favourites at the same time, it is undefined which favourite is executed when you enter the keyboard shortcut.

Do you want to assign this shortcut anyway?
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_LNK_ADVERTISED.caption: This is not the right kind of shortcut
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_LNK_ADVERTISED.content: IMatch supports 'real' shortcuts to applications files (.exe) only. The shortcut you have dropped looks like a shortcut to Windows Installer.\r\n\r\nTo use the application with IMatch, create a shortcut to the application executable file somewhere (e.g. on the Windows desktop) and then drag this shortcut to the Favourites panel.
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_PASTESYSTEMFAV.caption: System Favourite Set
messages.PTR_MSG_FAVS_PASTESYSTEMFAV.content: This favourite set is managed by the system. You cannot add favourites to it.
messages.PTR_MSG_MB_WRITEBACK_RO_ALL.caption: Read-only Files
messages.PTR_MSG_MB_WRITEBACK_RO_ALL.content: All files in the selection are marked as read-only on disk or are on a non-writeable media.
messages.PTR_MSG_MB_WRITEBACK_RO_ONEORMORE.conten: One file in the selection is marked as read-only on disk or on a non-writeable media.
{0} files in the selection are marked as read-only on disk or are on a non-writeable media.

dialogs.PTRMDLG_APPPREFS_BACKGROUND.#l_check_wbs: This option should always be on.\nIf you disable it, IMatch will not synchronise XMP metadata into IPTC, EXIF, PDF etc.\nThis may cause compatibility problems with other applications.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_APPPREFS_RELATIONS_VERSIONS_OPTI: This colour is used to visualise the relation.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_DB_DIAG.td.12: <Bold>Optimising</Bold><LineBreak/><Run FontSize='{fs12}'>Optimising and analysing the database structure. This step can take a few minutes.</Run>
dialogs.PTRMDLG_FILTERPANEL_COLOR.#l_weight:H: If this is on, IMatch prefers images which contain the requested colours in similar amounts.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_FILTERPANEL_COLOR.caption: Colour
dialogs.PTRMDLG_FILTERPANEL_MATCH.#l_color:H: This filter finds similar images based on the overall colours in the image.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_FILTERPANEL_MATCH.#l_colorandsha: This filter finds similar images based on the overall colour, shape and texture in the image.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_FILTERPANEL_MATCH.#l_colorimp:H: The overall importance of colour for the search.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_HISTORY_FAVS_CHOOSER.caption: Favourites
dialogs.PTRMDLG_HISTORY_FAVS_SHORTCUT.#l_tip: You cannot create shortcuts using the <Alt> key.<LineBreak/><LineBreak/>To execute a favourite via its shortcut, press <F3> followed by the shortcut you assign here.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_HISTORY_FAVS_SHORTCUT.caption: Favourite Shortcut
dialogs.PTRMDLG_HISTORY_FAVS_SHORTCUT_INPUT.#l_m: No favourite is associated with this keyboard shortcut or the favourite set containing the favourite is not loaded.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_HISTORY_FAVS_SHORTCUT_INPUT.#l_p: Press the keyboard shortcut of the favourite you want to execute.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_IMPEXP_BATCH_PPFORMAT.#l_usmlab:: This mode minimises colour halos and allows you to sharpen more.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_IMPEXP_BATCH_PRESETSEL.#l_preset: Select the p&resets you want to include as favourites:
dialogs.PTRMDLG_MDPANEL_CONFIG_CAMDASH.#l_hliso:: ISO Highlight\nEnable this option to display the ISO value in a different colour\nwhen it is higher than the entered value.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_SEARCH_VISUALQUERY.#l_check_orie: Favour image with the same orientation
If this option is enabled, images with the same orientation (portrait, landscape) as the original image are considered 'better' matches.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_SEARCH_VISUALQUERY.#l_radio_colo: In this mode, IMatch uses the most dominant colours in the image to find similar images.
In this mode, IMatch looks at the shapes and the colour layout in the image to find similar images.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_SEARCH_VISUALQUERYSKETCH.#l_dele: Right-click and drag to delete colours in the grid.
dialogs.PTRMDLG_TOOLS_DATETIME.#l_check_digitize: Digitised date and time\nThe time the image was digitised. For digital cameras this should usually be the same as the Original date and time.
[Date/Time Digitised: When was the photo digitised]
